name: 高淩菁
objective:
As a mater-level course in marketing research, this course is designed to
‧　　provide a understanding of research methodology and its implementation in marketing
‧　　understand the role, scope, and process of marketing research, and
‧　　enable the student to do real marketing research.
This course emphasizes an applied approach with practical applications of marketing research in management.
